Description: Polished black-topped brownware pottery bowl; rippled surfaces; repaired.
Curator's comments: Published: 5000 Years of Egyptian Art, London 1962, p. 12 [5].
Published: R Friedman 'Badari Grave Group 569' in W. V. Davies (ed), Studies in Egyptian Antiquities: A Tribute to T. G. H. James (BM Occasional Paper 123, 1999), 1-11.
Acquisition name: Donated by: British School of Archaeology, Egypt
